Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its value and the impact it can have on your operations, I am offering it to you for $9,500. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the unique benefits and advantages this product offers over others in the market. I understand its worth to you is $8,000, but I hope you can see the additional value in my proposal. Should you require more information or have any questions, please don't hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
